name: Gems
pages: Gems or stones, can be affixed to jewelry and other items by placing the item in the 1st slot of an anvil and the gem in the 2nd slot.$(br)Gems provide additional mana and recharges to items.$(br)Note: Gems don't necessarily need to be actual gems. ex. an iron ingot could be setup to be a gem.

pages.title: Topaz
pages.text: Topaz is the least powerful and most common gem.$(br)$(l)Tier:$() $(4)1$()$(br)$(l)Mana:$() $(1)25$()$(br)$(l)Recharges:$() $(6)1$()$(br)

pages.title: Onyx
pages.text: Onyx is the 2nd least powerful gem.$(br)$(l)Tier:$() $(4)2$()$(br)$(l)Mana:$() $(1)50$()$(br)$(l)Recharges:$() $(6)1$()$(br)

pages.title: Diamond
pages.text: Diamond is the only vanilla gem by default.$(br)$(l)Tier:$() $(4)3$()$(br)$(l)Mana:$() $(1)75$()$(br)$(l)Recharges:$() $(6)2$()$(br)$(l)Spell Cost:$() $(3)-2%$()$(br)$(l)Spell Cooldown:$() $(3)-2%$()$(br)$(l)Spell Frequency:$() $(3)+2%$()

pages.title: Jadeite
pages.text: Jadeite replaces vanilla Emerald as a gem for jewelry.$(br)$(l)Tier:$() $(4)4$()$(br)$(l)Mana:$() $(1)100$()$(br)$(l)Recharges:$() $(6)2$()$(br)$(l)Spell Cost:$() $(3)-4%$()$(br)$(l)Spell Cooldown:$() $(3)-4%$()$(br)$(l)Spell Frequency:$() $(3)+4%$()
